title: WEDNESDAY - Playoff expansion and Dak's future in Dallas 2020
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY - Playoff expansion and Dak's future in Dallas 2020
description:
As the league continues to battle through the pandemic, NFL owner preparing for a possible expanded playoff format if necessary (0:07). The Steelers sending 4 players to the Reserve/COVID-19 list (1:36) including QB Ben Roethlisberger. Hear what head coach Mike Tomlin has to say (2:20) about their availability for Sunday's game against the Bengals. We'll also hear from Cowboys owner Jerry Jones (3:18) on the possibility of the team drafting Dak Prescott's replacement. Speaking of the Cowboys, they suffered a big loss to their defensive unit (3:33). A look at Thursday Night Football as the Colts get one of their offensive weapons back (3:52), while Titans Head Coach Mike Vrabel talks (4:07) about facing the savvy veteran in the form of Philip Rivers

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
